00014 bool PhysEventManager::IgnoreSDLQuitEvents;
00015 
00016 PhysEventManager::PhysEventManager()
00017 {
00018     SetIgnoreQuitEvents(false);
00019     SDL_SetEventFilter( PhysSDLFilter );
00020 }
00021 
00022 //These functions will give you the next event or help you manage the events
00023 unsigned int PhysEventManager::GetRemainingEventCount()
00024 {
00025     return EventQueue.size();
00026 }
00027 
00028 PhysEvent* PhysEventManager::GetNextEvent()
00029 {
00030     if(EventQueue.size()==0)
00031     {
00032             return 0;
00033     }
00034     PhysEvent* results = EventQueue.front();
00035     EventQueue.pop_front();
00036     return results;
00037 }
00038 
00039 PhysEventRenderTime* PhysEventManager::GetNextRenderTimeEvent()
00040 {
00041     PhysEventRenderTime* results = 0;
00042     for(list<PhysEvent*>::iterator Iter = EventQueue.begin(); Iter!=EventQueue.end(); Iter++)
00043     {
00044         if((*Iter)->getEventType()==RenderTime)
00045         {
00046             results = dynamic_cast<PhysEventRenderTime*> (*Iter);
00047             EventQueue.erase(Iter);
00048             return results;
00049         }
00050     }
00051     return results;
00052 }
00053 
00054 PhysEventUserInput* PhysEventManager::GetNextUserInputEvent()
00055 {
00056     PhysEventUserInput* results = 0;
00057     for(list<PhysEvent*>::iterator Iter = EventQueue.begin(); Iter!=EventQueue.end(); Iter++)
00058     {
00059         if((*Iter)->getEventType()==UserInput)
00060         {
00061             results = dynamic_cast<PhysEventUserInput*> (*Iter);
00062             EventQueue.erase(Iter);
00063             return results;
00064         }
00065     }
00066     return results;
00067 }
00068 
00069 void PhysEventManager::AddEvent(PhysEvent* EventToAdd)
00070 {
00071     EventQueue.push_back(EventToAdd);
00072 }
00073 
00074 bool PhysEventManager::DoQuitMessagesExist()
00075 {
00076         return false;//This is system dependent.
00077 }

00079 bool PhysEventManager::IgnoreQuitEvents()
00080 {
00081     return IgnoreSDLQuitEvents;
00082 }
00083 
00084 void PhysEventManager::SetIgnoreQuitEvents(bool Ignore)
00085 {
00086     IgnoreSDLQuitEvents=Ignore;
00087 }

00089 int PhysSDLFilter( const RawEvent *event )
00090 {
00091      if ( !PhysEventManager::IgnoreQuitEvents() && event->type == SDL_QUIT)
00092         { return 0; }
00093      return 1;
00094 }
